cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the HL7 Study Retention Policy

dcmRetentionPeriod.title: Minimal Study Retention Period
dcmRetentionPeriod.description: Minimal Study Retention Period in ISO-8601 period format PnYnMnD or PnW

dcmMaxRetentionPeriod.title: Maximal Study Retention Period
dcmMaxRetentionPeriod.description: Minimal Study Retention Period in ISO-8601 period format PnYnMnD or PnW

dcmProperty.title: Conditions
dcmProperty.description: Conditions in format {SEG}-{Seq#}[.{Comp#}[.{SubComp#}]][!]={regEx}. Examples: MSH-4=FORWARD or MSH-9=ADT\^A28\^ADT_A05

dcmStartRetentionPeriodOnStudyDate.title: Start Retention Period on Study Date
dcmStartRetentionPeriodOnStudyDate.description: Indicates if retention period should be started on individual Study Dates instead on receive of the HL7 message triggering this rule.
